q: He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.
h:
“He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

q: Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
h:
“Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.” —
Zen Proverb

q: An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.
h:
“An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: It is only depth of character that determines the profundity with which we face life.
h:
“It is only depth of character that determines the profundity with which we face life.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
h:
“Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.” —
Brian Tracy

q: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
h:
“In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.” —
Miguel de Cervantes

q: There is no value in anything until it is finished.
h:
“There is no value in anything until it is finished. ” —
Genghis Khan

q: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.
h:
“You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.” —
Les Brown

q: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
h:
“If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.” —
Dalai Lama

q: Your past does not equal your future.
h:
“Your past does not equal your future.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Don't seek, don't search, don't ask, don't knock, don't demand – relax.
h:
“Don't seek, don't search, don't ask, don't knock, don't demand – relax.” —
Osho

q: The first rule of handling conflict is don't hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict.
h:
“The first rule of handling conflict is don't hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
h:
“The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.” —
Brian Tracy

q: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
h:
“Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.” —
Carl Jung

q: The meaning of life is that it stops.
h:
“The meaning of life is that it stops.” —
Franz Kafka

q: Learning is a weightless treasure you can always carry easily.
h:
“Learning is a weightless treasure you can always carry easily.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
h:
“Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. ” —
Steve Jobs

q: The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.
h:
“The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.” —
Walt Whitman

q: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
h:
“The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.” —
Thich Nhat Hanh

q: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
h:
“Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.” —
Og Mandino

q: He who can, does.
h:
“He who can, does.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray.
h:
“When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray.” —
Rumi

q: Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.
h:
“Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.” —
Bob Marley

q: You cannot find peace avoiding life.
h:
“You cannot find peace avoiding life.” —
Virginia Woolf

q: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
h:
“Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.” —
Helen Keller

q: Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow.
h:
“Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow. ” —
Anne Wilson Schaef

q: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
h:
“It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.” —
Herman Melville

q: If you run you stand a chance of losing, but if you don't run you've already lost.
h:
“If you run you stand a chance of losing, but if you don't run you've already lost.” —
Barack Obama

q: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
h:
“It is never too late to be what you might have been.” —
George Eliot

q: Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas.
h:
“Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas. ” —
Ray Bradbury

q: Unless you're ashamed of yourself now and then, you're not honest.
h:
“Unless you're ashamed of yourself now and then, you're not honest.” —
William Faulkner

q: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
h:
“Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.” —
Sigmund Freud

q: In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons.
h:
“In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons. ” —
Herodotus

q: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
h:
“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.” —
Helen Keller

q: A lot of people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could.
h:
“A lot of people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could.” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
h:
“Fear is stupid. So are regrets.” —
Marilyn Monroe

q: Power is not what we do but what we do not - hasty and unwise actions that we repeat every day and which ultimately bring us into trouble.
h:
“Power is not what we do but what we do not - hasty and unwise actions that we repeat every day and which ultimately bring us into trouble.” —
Robert Greene

q: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
h:
“Thinking will not overcome fear but action will. ” —
W. Clement Stone

q: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
h:
“Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.” —
Richard Bach

q: How much pain they have cost us, the evils which have never happened.
h:
“How much pain they have cost us, the evils which have never happened.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Where focus goes, energy flows.
h:
“Where focus goes, energy flows.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
h:
“Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.” —
Soren Kierkegaard

q: In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.
h:
“In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
h:
“I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
h:
“Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.” —
Les Brown

q: You have as much laughter as you have faith.
h:
“You have as much laughter as you have faith.” —
Martin Luther

q: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
h:
“By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.” —
Benjamin Franklin

q: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
h:
“Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.” —
Mahatma Gandhi

q: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
h:
“They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.” —
James Allen

q: Life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
h:
“Life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.” —
Jim Rohn
